Articles.Content:
First and foremost: this is a rather modded install of x64, so if you're not the brave, adventurous type, turn back now.

On the subject, I've most recently been getting a lot of crashes related to what seems to be either Universal Storage, Fine Print, or KSP AVC, but I've uninstalled and reinstalled all three, testing throughout, and there was no change. This is on a rather progressed save so I'd really like to not lose what progress I have. Output log: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74775048/output%20logs/ksp/output_log.txt

The crash does not occur on making a brand new sandbox/career game.
Ok, even non-brave adventurous types could help. would really appreciate anything anyone can figure out.
